definition: cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
to shout/to call/to order/to ask/to be called/by (indicates agent in the passive mood)

sentences.english: Figure out kitty’s mood by paying attention to the speed and volume of his mewling.
sentences.chinese: 要關注貓叫聲的大小和速率來判明貓的心情。

sentences.english: This time he did not hear any cat noises.
sentences.chinese: 這一次，他沒有聽到貓叫聲。

sentences.english: The Egyptians and the Chinese named cats for the sound they make.
sentences.chinese: 埃及人和中國人用貓叫聲來稱呼貓。
